titles.title: Public Housing for the Elderly Protection Act
To limit occupancy of nonelderly single persons in dwelling units located in public housing projects for elderly families.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Introduced. Public Housing for the Elderly Protection Act - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to limit occupancy of nonelderly single persons in public housing projects for the elderly.
